SA20n1296:4: bodhisattvaḥ kāmayate vinetuṃ sattvānaparhatuṃ duḥkhāni dadāti tasmāddānam |
SA20n1296:12: yatra va kacijjāyate bhavantyasya prabhṛtāni dhanānītyasyātmalābhaḥ |
SA20n1296:13: tarpayansattvānāṃ cittaṃ śikṣayati vinayati vidadhāti tānavimatsarānityeṣa paralābhaḥ |
SA20n1296:14: vitarannalakṣaṇaṃ mahādānaṃ sattveṣu pariṇāmyātmanā salābhinaḥ karotītyeṣa ubhayalābhaḥ |
SA20n1296:22: vibhajya prakāśayati paramārtham anuśaṃsati vīryaguṇānbhāṣate pramādātyayapāpamityucyate dharmadānam |
SA20n1296:23: yadi sattvo vibheti nṛpātsaṃhādvyābrādvṛkājjalādagne rdasyoścaurādvā bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe tatparitrāyat ityamayadānam |
SA20n1296:24: ātmano vittāni yāvad ratnaṃ hastinamaśvaṃ rathaṃ vasrāṇi dhānyaṃ vāsasī peyaṃ khādyaṃ yāvatkavalamātramekasūtraṃ prabhūtamalpaṃ vā vitaranna mātsaryaṃ kurute |
SA20n1296:27: prathamaṃ saralacittadānaṃ dvitīyaṃ śraddhā cittadānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ yathākāladānaṃ caturthaṃ svahastena dānaṃ paṃcamaṃ yathādharmadānam ||
SA20n1296:30: madyaṃ na dātavyaṃ parebhyo viṣaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vikṣepasattvāt |
SA20n1296:33: gītaṃ striyaśca na dātavyāḥ parebhyaścittapavitratāyā dūṣakatvāt |
SA20n1296:35: yanna yathādharmaṃ yacca vikṣepakaraṃ vikṣepakaraṃ sattvānāṃ tanna dātavyaṃ parebhyaḥ |
SA20n1296:41: prasarannasya yaśovarṇaḥ śrūyate daśasu dikṣviti caturthaḥ |
SA20n1296:45: yathādharmaṃ dhanamupārjyopādāya yaddadāti taducyate sarvadānam pariśuddhacittena yadaśāṭhayadānaṃ taducyate sarvadānam |
SA20n1296:50: apaśyañchīlāśīlaṃ kṣetrākṣetraṃ yaddadāti taducyate sarvadānam apaśyaz ṇchilāśīlaṃ kṣetākṣetraṃ yaddadāti taducyate sarvadānam |
SA20n1296:53: ditsayā dānakāle pradāya yannānuśocati taducyate sarvadānam ||
SA20n1296:58: yadi falaṃ dadāti labhate pūrayati cānāsravafalam |
SA20n1296:61: yadi pradīpaṃ dadāti buddhacakṣurlabhate bhāsvaraṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvānām |
SA20n1296:65: pariśrameṇa [ sattva- ] sevāṃ yadyācarati labhate daśavalāni caturvaiśaradyāni |
SA20n1296:67: rāṣṭraṃ nagaraṃ dārānputrāñchira ścakṣura hastapādau yāvatsarvakāyaṃ dadātyantarā citramātsaryaṃ prāptamanuttarāṃ bodhiṃ parinirvāpayituṃ sattvān |
SA20n1296:68: bodhisattvo mahāsattva ācarandānacaryāṃ bhavatyavittadṭaṣṭi rdānādānayoralakṣaṇatvāttatasmātpūrayati dānapāramitām ||
SA20n1296:69: ( iti bodhicittotpādasṛtraśāstre dānapāramitā nāma caturtho vargaḥ ||)
